ygData.subject: Best Trade you ever made?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have made some good trades in my day and was wonder what some of the better trades you guys made were?  My favorite trade I ever made was when I traded an
ygData.messageBody:
I have made some good trades in my day and was wonder what some of the
better trades you guys made were? My favorite trade I ever made was when I
traded an SMR and 2k pp for an Ishva Robe. I then traded the Ishva robe for
1 pair of Golden Efreeti Boots, 1 SMR, 1 55hp 55mana necklace and 1 Box of
Abu Kar. I then traded the 55hp 55mana necklace for another pair of Golden
Efreeti Boots. All of this was Pre-Kunark/50+ so GEBS and SMR's were really
expensive (13k and 10k or so respectively.)

My worst trade? Maybe the last one I did before I left I traded a Fungi
Tunic for a Bloodfire and 10kpp. But its probobly the one item I have
wanted ever since I could remember, well not counting the Bladestorm, Katana
of Steel Sleet. But they took that out of the game pretty quick. That
weapon was just really crazy don't know how it ever made it into the game
(30/45 2hs with a 970 something or other AoE proc. It proc'd in waves so
you could move out of the waves you saw it had proc'd.) Anyone know of
someone with this sword? I know of only one on my server but the guy moved
with the split. They wouldn't let him use it in the Warrior Best of the
Best. Well, rambled long enough. 5 months 3 weeks till I can play EQ
again.

Mu
Lost at Sea
